snippet.title: Drops of Death | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
A murder mystery visual novel with a romantic twist. The killer is randomly chosen at the start of each playthrough, and you may unknowingly fall in love with them.

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404300/Drops_of_Death/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=trailer&utm_content=071723
